name: Super Dice Boy
description:
A puzzle platformer where you need to carry and throw dice to get past obstacles.

Inspired by games like Super Meat Boy and JumpKing.

Last Update before the game jam ends:

Fixed some bugs and added testers in the credits screen.

Sadly working solo is hard and I'm not able to add another level in time beyond the 5 implemented. 

During play testing, the average play time was around 30 minutes. Expert gamers took 15 minutes on average, while completely new to gaming people took 30 to 40 minutes without completing the last level. 

Update: Added another level

My entry (WIP) for the GMTK 2022 Gamejam.

Warning: The video contains the entire playthrough up to the level before the last one. If you don't want to see the solution to the puzzles avoid watching the video.

Input:

E - Pickup die

Hold E while carrying a die - Charge up the throwing force

Release E while carrying a die - Throw the die in the direction of the mouse pointer

F - Let go of the die

Will update as I go
